message:
An innovative healthcare technology Company is hiring a qualified caliber :

Software Developer :

Basic Functions:

• Perform translation of designs into software, development of code, documentation, and software testing
• Perform modification of software, fixing software “bugs” in existing code, and troubleshooting issues on production and test systems.

Principal areas of activity:

• Modify existing software to adapt it to new hardware and improve the performance.
• Design and develop software systems.
• Analyze information, determine, recommend and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system.
• Develop software system testing and validation procedures.
• Plan software programming and development of documentation.
• Consult with customers, other departments on project status, proposals and technical issues.
• Store, retrieve and manipulate data for analysis of system capabilities and requirements.
Key Measurement:
• 3+ years’ experience writing web application in .NET
• Strong knowledge in HTML and CSS
• Strong knowledge in SQL Server development.
• Strong knowledge in ECMA JavaScript
• Strong knowledge in jQuery is a must
• familiarity with ASP.NET MVC is a must 
• familiarity with Entity Framework is a plus
• familiarity with Web Service, XML and JSON is a plus

To apply please send your C.V at : Christina.saber@drbridge.com
